answers.answer: "Diabetic, controlled with food and tablets, he still eats to much sugar,..does this affect his mood swings.."Eating any amount of sugar is not controlling ones diabetes, it progresses diabetes. Eating too much sugar will cause a variety of health issues, like unusual mood and behavior patterns. Your partner needs to see his doctor for re-evaluation and possible adjustments to his diabetes medication. Also, a check for bipolar disorder as it causes mood swings alternating rapidly between depression and euphoria. Good luck

question: my partner, 56 has recently been diagnosed as Diabetic, controlled with food and tablets, he still eats to much sugar, does this affect his mood swings, as he can be a different person, with his truly firework like behaviour.
title: James Mc Adam
